WiSSAP 2023

Winter School on Speech and Audio Processing

18 December - 21 December / Kanpur, India

0 days / 00 hours / 00 minutes / 00 seconds

/ About

WiSSAP 2023 is an annual winter school on audio and speech processing, started in 2006. It provides a forum for researchers to interact with and learn from experts in areas at the forefront of speech and audio signal processing. The past 15 WiSSAPs have covered different aspects of speech and audio processing, such as audio perception, recognition, coding, enhancement, synthesis, specialization, production, and hearing aids.

WiSSAP goes musical this year with the theme as Music Information Retrieval: AI for Music. The event will feature invited talks and tutorials by internationally recognized researchers providing a didactic introduction to a range of modern topics in the area. This school is the next edtion of WiSSAP 2020.

If you have any questions about the school, don't hesitate to contact us by email wissap2023@gmail.com. Welcome to the scenic IIT Kanpur for this unique opportunity.

/ Speakers

George Tzanetakis

University of Victoria

Zhiyao Duan

University of Rochester

Andrew McPherson

Imperial College London

Registration is currently open! We have only limited spots available. For more details on how to register and attend the school, please visit the registration page and Register Now!

WiSSAP 2023

/ Program

WiSSAP 2023 shall also host poster/oral sessions and a competition. We invite researchers, professionals, or students to submit their proposal in the Call for Abstract and/or participate in the competition.
